extendedInfo.description: Learning Java Best GuideThis application will introduce you with the Java Programming language. This application is for beginners, who wants to learn Java from scratch. In this beginners Java Tutorial you will learn how to download and install JDK on your machine and then use the JDK.Java BasicWhat is Programming?Programming or coding is a language that is used by operating systems to perform the task. We know computer understands binary languages with digits 1s and 0s.What is Java?Java is a high-level object-oriented programming language developed by the Sun Microsystems. Though it is associated with the World Wide Web but it is older than the origin of Web.Where Java is used?The programming language Java was developed by Sun Microsystems in the year 1995. Earlier, it was only used to design and program small computing devices but later adopted as one of the platform independent programming language.Java ReleasesJava is developed by Sun Microsystems in 1996. The tables given below provide information about the name and time of releases for different versions of Java technology. Downloading JDK (Java)In this lesson you will learn how to download java from the sun web site.Installing JavaIn this lesson you will learn how to install and configure java on your machine.This is ad supported free version so following permissions are required* Internet* Locationtags : java , learning , programming , arrays , language , beans , database , free learning , school , training , tutorial

reviews.title: Great app to learn Java
reviews.comment: I really liked this app. Simple, neat and clean way of explaining.  I recommend it.
reviews.author: Kunal Lanjewar

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: this app is great for beginners! dont listen to the people who give it 1 star, this app is easy and amazing!
reviews.author: Joe Petrakis

reviews.title: This is awesome, but...
reviews.comment: This app is really straight forward and easy to follow along. I just need a bit of help: In step 5 how to run your Java program in the output section mine looks exactly like your example except it doesn\'t include the My First Project line. What should I do to fix it? Never mind i got it fixed i just needed to read a little further..
reviews.author: Sarah Luke

reviews.title: Won\'t run...
reviews.comment: By all the comments I would assume this is an excellent app to learn Java on. Unfortunately it won\'t run on my galaxy tab 10.1 so I can\'t give it the rating it probably deserves.......  In response to the developer, I have reinstalled the application 3 times now and it still won\'t open.  I\'m a computer network engineer and have been in the cell phone industry for 3 years now.  The app doesn\'t work on my device, even after a full wipe/reload of the Android operating system, so I\'m rating it based on that result.  The Play Store says it\'s compatible with my device, perhaps it\'s not.  When it works on my Galaxy Tab I\'ll adjust my rating, till then it\'s staying 1 star.
reviews.author: Jackel Jay

reviews.title: Vubfybh
reviews.comment: Not working. When I open o see all black on my phone. O waited but, it really doesnt work. Wasting of time
reviews.author: Margie Belleta

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Runs great on my HTC Thunderbolt (rooted,  ASOP ROM)... But why the location permission? I\'m assuming for location based advertising.
reviews.author: Joseph Schmitz

reviews.title: Totally Awesome!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much.   System.out.println (\"this app rocks\") ;

reviews.title: why i can\'t donate you?
reviews.comment: i really satisfied with it. but why i cannot donate you? at least i wanna show my gratitude upon you for creating such a great free apps for public. very recommendable!
reviews.author: Ghaza Amos

reviews.title: The most useful java app I have found
reviews.comment: I was student working toward a BA in software design. Jobs were few and far between so I took an entry lvl IT positions for desktop support. So when an opurtunity to move into a junior lvl Java developer position opened up I needed to brush up on the basic and get into \"real world\" design structure.  Out of all my books and code I had written in the past, this app was the most helpful for quick reference. ..thanks!
reviews.author: Wesley Daniels

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Easy to use and easy to understand with great pictures. Recommended to anyone interested in programming.
reviews.author: zach parker

reviews.title: Great app for Java Programming Tutorials
reviews.comment: This is app is perfect more my needs of learning simple and some complex parts of Java. It is definitely for beginners. If you are a lazy type (like me) and don\'t want to read now you don\'t have to. I\'m starting a YouTube series that is based on this app so that you can watch instead of read. It is still HIGHLY suggested that you get the app for source code!!!!!! Thank you for this wonderful app.
reviews.author: Matthew Mehrtens

reviews.comment: Great job thank you.The interface is really good .
